dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: Who dares to wander into my frozen domain?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am just passing through, no need for hostility.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Hmph, outsiders are not welcome here. What is your purpose?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek knowledge about the ancient frost magic.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Knowledge is power, indeed. You may stay... for now.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Thank you for your hospitality.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Do not mistake tolerance for acceptance. Be gone!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will not overstay my welcome.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Wise choice. Leave my presence.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I come in peace, seeking aid against a common enemy.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A common enemy, you say? Speak, and choose your words carefully.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Together, we can defeat the threat that looms large.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Alliances are forged in blood. Will you prove your worth?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I understand. I will find another solution.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Weakness disgusts me. Leave before I change my mind.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek the legendary Frost Crystal to enhance my powers.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: The Frost Crystal is not a mere trinket for the unworthy. Prove your worthiness.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will undergo any trial to prove myself.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bravery is commendable. But do you have the strength to withstand the trial?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will respect your decision and leave.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Respect is rare in these lands. You may pass.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I have no interest in your domain. I will leave.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Wise choice. Leave now before you face the consequences.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Understood. I will depart immediately.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Good. Do not return, or you will not escape.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will not be threatened. Prepare for a fight.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Foolish mortal. You shall regret your defiance!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I come seeking your wisdom, mighty Ice Colossus.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Wisdom comes at a price. What do you offer in return for my knowledge?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I offer a piece of ancient lore that might interest you.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Interesting. Share this lore, and I shall consider your request.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Here is the tale of the Eternal Blizzard, as promised.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Impressive. You have piqued my curiosity. Speak your request.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I have nothing to offer but my gratitude.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Gratitude is meaningless. Leave my presence.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I possess a rare artifact that may interest you.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Artifacts intrigue me. Show me this item, and state your request.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Behold the Frozen Scepter of Ages, a gift for your assistance.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Intriguing. You may have caught my interest. State your request.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I cannot part with this artifact.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Stubbornness will lead to your downfall. Leave now!
